Global.ContactError: Nije uspio kontaktirati BMM, možete poslati e-mail na: {0}
Global.UnexpectedError: Sorry, an unexpected error has occurred.
Global.ItemNotFound: The requested item does not exist.
Global.OfflineBanner: Showing only tracks on this phone
Global.BackgroundActivityRestrictedMessage: Your device settings restrict BMM from working in the background. You will not be able to listen, when your phone is locked for a few minutes. To change it, go to application settings and "Allow background activity" under the "Battery" section.
Global.DownloadPlaylistOnceOnWifi: The playlist will be downloaded the next time you're on Wifi. You can enable "Download via mobile network" in your Profile.
Global.DownloadPodcastOnceOnWifi: The latest tracks for this podcast will be downloaded the next time you're on Wifi. You can enable "Download via mobile network" in your Profile.

MediaPlayer.ErrorPlayerStoppedGeneric: A playback error has occurred that stopped the current track.

HelpFeedbackViewModel.Title: Pomoć i povratne informacije
HelpFeedbackViewModel.GuideIntroTitle: Kako da biste dobili najviše iz BMM aplikacija
HelpFeedbackViewModel.GuideIntroSubtitle: Prijeđite prstom da biste saznali više
HelpFeedbackViewModel.GuideOfflineSubtitle: Preuzimanje popisa za reproduciranje na uređaju i slušajte ih bez internet veze. Uključite ovo u popisu za reproduciranje.
HelpFeedbackViewModel.GuideAddToPlaylistSubtitle: Save your favorite tracks to your own playlists or to your personal BMM collection 'My Tracks' by tapping the options button to the right of the track.
HelpFeedbackViewModel.GuideLanguagesSubtitle: Postavljanje prioriteta jezika BMM sadržaja. To može biti učinjeno u postavkama > jezik sadržaja.
HelpFeedbackViewModel.GuideLibrarySubtitle: Get quick access to the content you want. The Library section consists of all the available podcasts and an archive section to browse content.
HelpFeedbackViewModel.GuideSearchSubtitle: Pronaći određenu pjesmu ili pretraživanje za pronalaženje srodnih sadržaja. Pretraživanja se spremaju automatski.

UserSetupViewModel.SettingUpAccountMessage: We're setting up your account. This might take a few moments.

SupportEndedViewModel.DeviceSupportEnding: We will soon stop support for phones running {0} {1} or older. If possible, you should update your phone.

SupportEndedViewModel.AppSupportEnding: You are using an old version of the BMM app. We will soon stop support for that version. Please update BMM.
SupportEndedViewModel.AppSupportEnded: You are using an old version of the BMM app, which is no longer supported. Please update BMM.
